name: Twice Baked Sweet Potatoes with Ricotta Cheese
author: frank11
summary: A tasty, savory version of twice baked sweet potatoes.
directions: Preheat oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C)
Pierce potatoes with a fork and bake until soft, about 1 hour
Remove from oven and cool until potatoes can be handled, about 20 minutes
Reduce oven temperature to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Meanwhile, place olive oil in small skillet over medium heat
Add shallots and cook and stir until softened and beginning to brown, about 10 minutes
Cut potatoes in half lengthwise and scoop out pulp, leaving a thin shell
Place pulp into a blender or food processor and blend until smooth
Add ricotta, salt, pepper, ginger, and sugar to the blender;  blend until smooth
Return potato mixture to a bowl; stir in shallots, Parmesan cheese, and sage
Spoon mixture back into potato skins
Place potatoes on prepared baking sheet
Bake until heated through, about 30 minutes
